name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. Ricardo FOY, Petitioner

judges: MONTEMURO, J., is sitting by designation as Senior Justice pursuant to Judicial Assignment Docket No. 94 R1800, due to thé unavailability of LARSEN, J.; see No. 127 Judicial Administration Docket No. 1, filed October 28, 1993.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. Ricardo FOY, Petitioner.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 3d day of June, 1994, it is hereby ordered that the request for stay filed by petitioner Ricardo Foy is denied.
MONTEMURO, J., is sitting by designation as Senior Justice pursuant to Judicial Assignment Docket No. 94 R1800, due to thé unavailability of LARSEN, J.; see No. 127 Judicial Administration Docket No. 1, filed October 28, 1993.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Marvin W. Factor, Factor & Factor, Philadelphia, for R. Foy.
Kathy L. Echternach, John Carpenter, Dist. Attorney’s Office, Philadelphia, for Com.
casebody.head_matter:
652 A.2d 795
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. Ricardo FOY, Petitioner.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
June 3, 1994.
Marvin W. Factor, Factor & Factor, Philadelphia, for R. Foy.
Kathy L. Echternach, John Carpenter, Dist. Attorney’s Office, Philadelphia, for Com.
